price: 46. То mpe ezua bango na ngonga ya misala na bango mpo bazua nzela ya kokima te.
arabic: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ فِي تَقَلُّبِهِمۡ فَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: aw yakhudhahum fī taqallubihim famā hum bimuʿ'jizīna
